#summary A quick installation guideline

Extract the archived file. You will see two directories.


= RunUO server side =

In RunUO_script directory, copy the *CustomRemoteAdminPacketHandlers.cs* into anywhere of your RunUO Scripst directory. You may start your RunUO server now.


= Web server side =

Upload all files under *web_control_panel* directory into your web server directory. Browse the *runuo_remote_admin.php*, you will see a logon page. Input the RunUO server IP/domain, port, then your RunUO admin account to login. The RunUO account can be administrator, owner, developer or game master access level in RunUO server.
